title: Nice little addition to your wardrobe
content: These are really cute little belts to have on hand.  They arrived quickly and I thought they were of pretty good quality. The price for three belts is super affordable and the colors go well with everything.  I haven't really worn belts very often over the past many years, but recently decided to get some to wear with jeans.  Unfortunately, I ordered these in size large and I really need the medium.  I sent them back but will order the correct size again.

title: Stylish
content: For the price I honestly thought these would turn out to be fake leather but they aren’t!  I got the small and even though the size range was very clear I have to wear them on the smallest hole which means there’s  a lot of extra belt.  If you plan to wear them with something without belt loops be aware there is a lot of extra belt.  I looped it back under the belt but since it is real leather it isn’t super flexible.  All in all…highly recommend!

title: Verified Purchase
content: I love these, perfect colors for my wardrobe’s aesthetic! I add one of these belts to pretty much any outfit and it instantly elevates my outfit and helps to break up colors or tie the color scheme together. They are nice and sturdy, the gold buckle is still good, doesn’t tarnish, I hang my belts instead of rolling them to prevent creases, the holes are the perfect length for my size and what I ordered, the colors are great, and the width is awesome, not too thick and not too skinny so I can use with belt loops or without!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023

title: QUALITY LEATHER BELTS
content: This pack covers almost any outfit I want to wear. I love these belts and this was the best decision for my closet to add some depth to my outfits. I highly recommend this set if you are trying to get into belts. I'm not usually a belt girl but now I am.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I'm very picky about quality. Made from vegan leather, these belts feel soft and are supple, not stiff like lower quality vegan leather. The buckles are excellent quality also with a nice weight and shine. I have a 31 inch waist and the small fits perfectly -- third hole on my jeans and fourth hole with a light dress. You can't beat the price for this kind of quality.
